overview: In Global Tectonics and the FLood, Dr. John Baumgardner examines how catastrophic plate tectonics could have been a major mechanism in the Genesis Flood model. Using the cutting-edge 3-D model known as TERRA, which he developed during his thesis research, Dr. Baumgardner shows how this massive upheaval of the earth's surface may have helped create the conditions necessary for such a devastating worldwide event.
title: Global Tectonics and the Flood
